ninja.smirking.events.bukkit

Class Events

  • java.lang.Object
    • ninja.smirking.events.bukkit.Events

  • public final class Events
extends Object
    A collection of static utility methods that pertain to the handling of Event objects.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • observe

        public static <T extends Event> Listener observe(Class<T> eventType,
                                                 Consumer<? super T> handler)
        Register a Listener which handles an event of the given type once before unregistering itself.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - non-null event type.
        handler - non-null consumer that handles the event.
        Returns:
        non-null Bukkit Listener.

      • observeAll

        public static <T extends Event> Listener observeAll(Class<T> eventType,
                                                    Consumer<? super T> handler)
        Register a Listener which handles an event of the given type multiple times. It is only unregistered when the providing plugin is disabled.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - non-null event type.
        handler - non-null consumer that handles the event.
        Returns:
        non-null Bukkit Listener.

      • observeIf

        public static <T extends Event> Listener observeIf(Class<T> eventType,
                                                   Consumer<? super T> handler,
                                                   Predicate<T> test)
        Register a Listener which handles an event of the given type multiple times. A Predicate controls which events are passed to the handler.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - non-null event type.
        handler - non-null consumer that handles the event.
        test - non-null predicate that determines whether the event should be passed to the handler.
        Returns:
        non-null Bukkit Listener.

      • observeFor

        public static <T extends Event> Listener observeFor(Class<T> eventType,
                                                    Consumer<? super T> handler,
                                                    long duration,
                                                    TimeUnit unit)
        Register a Listener which handles an event of the given type multiple times. It is unregistered after the given duration has passed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - non-null event type.
        handler - non-null consumer that handles the event.
        duration - how long it should be before the Listener unregisters itself.
        unit - the unit that the duration was given in.
        Returns:
        non-null Bukkit Listener.

      • observeFor

        public static <T extends Event> Listener observeFor(Class<T> eventType,
                                                    BiConsumer<? super T,Long> handler,
                                                    long duration,
                                                    TimeUnit unit)
        Register a Listener which handles an event of the given type multiple times. It is unregistered after the given duration has passed.
        Type Parameters:
        T - event type.
        Parameters:
        eventType - non-null event type.
        handler - non-null consumer that handles the event and informs the handler of how many milliseconds are left before the Listener unregisters itself.
        duration - how long it should be before the Listener unregisters itself.
        unit - the unit that the duration was given in.
        Returns:
        non-null Bukkit Listener.
